Name: 2-1-1 Eastern Oklahoma
Services/Notes: Referrals for housing, food, utility, healthcare, mental health, addiction, and more
Description: Free, confidential 24/7 helpline for resource connection

Name: Catholic Charities Eastern OK
Services/Notes: Eviction prevention, ID help, SNAP, case mgmt
Description: Faith-based emergency support for reentry and low-income clients

Name: TEEM Reentry Services
Services/Notes: Transition planning, trades training, reentry case mgmt
Description: Workforce prep and trauma support for post-incarceration individuals

Name: Inside Out Re-Entry Services
Services/Notes: Women's reentry support, child reunification, trauma counseling
Description: Faith-based, trauma-informed support for formerly incarcerated women

Name: Center for Employment Opportunities (CEO Tulsa)
Description: Employment-first reentry program for recently incarcerated individuals

Name: Oklahoma DOC Reentry
Services/Notes: Housing, substance use treatment, education, parole support

Name: Counseling & Recovery Services of OK
Services/Notes: Outpatient substance use, family therapy, trauma counseling, MAT
Description: Community clinic offering behavioral and family mental health services

Name: Oklahoma Dept. of Mental Health & Substance Abuse (ODMHSAS)
Description: State support system for mental health & substance use recovery

Name: AA/NA Tulsa Meetings
Services/Notes: 12-step peer support, addiction recovery, daily meetings
Description: Free Alcoholics/Narcotics Anonymous in-person and virtual meetings

Name: Psychology Today Group Therapy Directory
Services/Notes: Therapy groups: DBT, grief, trauma, LGBTQ+, family & addiction
Description: Searchable directory of mental health group support in Tulsa

Name: NextUp (Madison Strategies Group)
Services/Notes: GED training, job placement, resume support for ages 18–24
Description: Career and education support for young adults.

Name: Retrain Tulsa
Description: Free career advancement training and job support services.

Name: Work Ready Oklahoma
Description: Statewide free employment support and placement assistance.

Name: OKDHS Child Care Subsidy Program
Services/Notes: Financial help with licensed child care
Description: Child care assistance for income-eligible working families.

Name: Tulsa County Transitional Living Center
Services/Notes: 90-day stay, case mgmt, childcare, budgeting, meals
Description: Temporary housing and case support for families in transition.

Name: St. Elizabeth Lodge (Catholic Charities)
Services/Notes: Apartments for single moms and children
Description: Transitional housing program to support family independence.

Name: Circle of Care for Children & Youth
Services/Notes: Drop-in center, life skills, street outreach
Description: Youth-focused transitional housing and mentoring programs.

Name: OK Juvenile Second Chance Act (YST)
Description: Reentry and case support for youth ages 12–24 leaving care.
